sources.name: SQLProductsOLTP
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLProductsOLTP

sources.name: StagingSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSource

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRows sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWhash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SQLProductsOLTP@ProductID,
		Name = SQLProductsOLTP@Name,
		ProductNumber = SQLProductsOLTP@ProductNumber,
		Color = SQLProductsOLTP@Color,
		StandardCost = SQLProductsOLTP@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SQLProductsOLTP@ListPrice,
		{_Inserted} = Inserted,
		{_LastUpdated} = Updated,
		DWhash = CreateHash@DWhash
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists
transformations.script:
CreateHash, StagingSource exists(CreateHash@DWhash == StagingSource@DWhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists

transformations.name: SetAttributes
transformations.script:
Lookup1 derive(Inserted = iif (isNull({_Inserted}),currentTimestamp(),{_Inserted}),
		Updated = iif (isNull({_LastUpdated}),currentTimestamp(),{_LastUpdated})) ~> SetAttributes

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
Exists, StagingSource lookup(SQLProductsOLTP@ProductID == StagingSource@ProductID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
